radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild abnormalities in the periventricular white matter consistent with a chronic small-vessel ischemic process.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the cervical, thoracic, and lumbar spine
radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild scattered degenerative changes of the spine, with no evidence of cord compression, nerve-root impingement, or a demyelinating process.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Hypoesthesia and weakness in the arms and legs did not improve, and the neurologic examination was unchanged from admission.
